atk-abh02a10:2_1: Idāni tadanantare maggavibhaṅge ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggotiādi sabbaṁ saccavibhaṅge dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāniddese vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:2_2: Bhāvanāvasena pāṭiyekkaṁ dassite dutiyanayepi sammādiṭṭhiṁ bhāveti vivekanissitantiādi sabbaṁ bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:2_3: Evamidaṁ dvinnampi nayānaṁ vasena suttantabhājanīyaṁ lokiyalokuttaramissakameva kathitaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:4_3: Yathā hi muddhābhisittassa rañño muddhābhisittāya deviyā kucchismiṁ jāto putto rājaputtoti avuttepi rājaputtoyeva hoti, evamayampi ariyoti avuttepi ariyo evāti veditabbo.
atk-abh02a10:5_1: Pañcaṅgikavārepi aṭṭhaṅgikoti avuttepi aṭṭhaṅgiko eva veditabbo.
atk-abh02a10:5_6: So ‘‘suttaṁ āharāhī’’ti vutto addhā aññaṁ apassanto imaṁ mahāsaḷāyatanato suttappadesaṁ āharissati ‘‘yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi, sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi.
atk-abh02a10:5_7: Yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo, vāyāmo, sati, yo tathābhūtassa samādhi, svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi.
atk-abh02a10:5_8: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hotī’’ti.
atk-abh02a10:6_1: Sace āharati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, no ce āharati sayaṁ āharitvā ‘‘evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchatī’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh02a10:6_3: lokuttaramaggo pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi, aṭṭhaṅgikova hotī’’ti vattabbo.
atk-abh02a10:7_0: Imāni pana tīṇi aṅgāni pubbe parisuddhāni vattanti, lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe parisuddhatarāni honti.
atk-abh02a10:7_3: Yasmiñhi samaye micchāvācaṁ pajahati, sammāvācaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye sammākammantasammāājīvā natthi.
atk-abh02a10:7_6: Yasmiṁ samaye micchākammantaṁ pajahati, sammākammantaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye sammāvācāsammāājīvā natthi.
atk-abh02a10:7_9: Yasmiṁ samaye micchāājīvaṁ pajahati, sammāājīvaṁ pūreti, tasmiṁ samaye sammāvācāsammākammantā natthi.
atk-abh02a10:7_12: Imaṁ etesaṁ pañcannaṁ kārāpakaṅgānaṁ kiccātirekataṁ dassetuṁ pañcaṅgiko maggoti gahitaṁ.
atk-abh02a10:7_13: Lokuttaramaggo pana aṭṭhaṅgikova hoti, pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi.
atk-abh02a10:8_0: ‘‘Yadi sammāvācādīhi saddhiṁ aṭṭhaṅgikoti vadatha, catasso sammāvācācetanā, tisso sammākammantacetanā, satta sammāājīvacetanāti imamhā cetanābahuttā kathaṁ muccissatha?
atk-abh02a10:8_4: ‘‘Tvaṁ tāva mahācattārīsakabhāṇako hosi, na hosī’’ti pucchitabbo.
atk-abh02a10:8_5: Sace ‘‘na homī’’ti vadati, ‘‘tvaṁ abhāṇakattā na jānāsī’’ti vattabbo.
atk-abh02a10:8_7: Sace suttaṁ āharati iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, no ce āharati sayaṁ uparipaṇṇāsato āharitabbaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:9_2: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā;
atk-abh02a10:9_3: atthi, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā.
atk-abh02a10:10_0: ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā?
atk-abh02a10:10_1: Musāvādā veramaṇī, pisuṇāya vācāya veramaṇī, pharusāya vācāya veramaṇī, samphappalāpā veramaṇī –
atk-abh02a10:10_2: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sammāvācā sāsavā puññabhāgiyā upadhivepakkā.
atk-abh02a10:11_0: ‘‘Katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā?
atk-abh02a10:11_1: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī –
atk-abh02a10:11_2: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sammāvācā ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgā…pe….
atk-abh02a10:13_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammākammanto ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro…pe….
atk-abh02a10:14_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo? Sammāājīvaṁpahaṁ, bhikkhave, dvāyaṁ vadāmi…pe… upadhivepakko.
atk-abh02a10:15_0: ‘‘Katamo ca, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo?
atk-abh02a10:15_1: Yā kho, bhikkhave, ariyacittassa anāsavacittassa ariyamaggasamaṅgino ariyamaggaṁ bhāvayato micchāājīvā ārati virati paṭivirati veramaṇī –
atk-abh02a10:15_2: ayaṁ, bhikkhave, sammāājīvo ariyo anāsavo lokuttaro maggaṅgo’’ti (ma. ni.
atk-abh02a10:16_0: Evamettha catūhi vacīduccaritehi, tīhi kāyaduccaritehi, micchājīvato cāti ekekāva virati ariyā anāsavā lokuttarā maggaṅgāti vuttā.
atk-abh02a10:16_3: Idaṁ te suttaṁ akāmakassa lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgikoti dīpeti’’.
atk-abh02a10:16_4: Sace ettakena sallakkheti iccetaṁ kusalaṁ, no ce sallakkheti aññānipi kāraṇāni āharitvā saññāpetabbo.
atk-abh02a10:17_0: ‘‘Yasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo na upalabbhati, samaṇopi tattha na upalabbhati…pe…
atk-abh02a10:17_1: imasmiṁ kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo upalabbhati;
atk-abh02a10:18_0: Aññesupi anekesu suttasatesu aṭṭhaṅgikova maggo āgato. Kathāvatthuppakaraṇepi vuttaṁ –
atk-abh02a10:21_2: Sace pana ettakenāpi saññattiṁ na gacchati, ‘‘gaccha, vihāraṁ pavisitvā yāguṁ pivāhī’’ti uyyojetabbo.
atk-abh02a10:22_1: Aṭṭhaṅgikamaggasmiñhi ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane catūsu maggesu cattāri nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a10:22_2: Pañcaṅgikamagge ekato pucchitvā ekato vissajjane cattāri;
atk-abh02a10:22_3: pāṭiyekkaṁ pucchitvā pāṭiyekkaṁ vissajjane cattāri cattārīti pañcasu aṅgesu vīsati.
atk-abh02a10:22_4: Iti purimāni aṭṭha imāni ca vīsatīti sabbānipi maggavibhaṅge aṭṭhavīsati nayasahassāni vibhattāni.
atk-abh02a10:22_6: Vipāke pana kusalato tiguṇā nayā kātabbāti.
atk-abh02a10:25_2: Ārammaṇattikesu pana sabbānipetāni appamāṇaṁ nibbānaṁ ārabbha pavattito appamāṇārammaṇāneva, na maggārammaṇāni.
atk-abh02a10:25_3: Neva hi maggo na phalaṁ maggaṁ ārammaṇaṁ karoti.
atk-abh02a10:25_5: vīriyaṁ vā vīmaṁsaṁ vā jeṭṭhakaṁ katvā maggabhāvanākāle maggādhipatīni;
atk-abh02a10:26_1: nibbānassa pana bahiddhādhammattā bahiddhārammaṇāni nāma hontīti evametasmiṁ pañhāpucchakepi nibbattitalokuttarāneva maggaṅgāni kathitāni.
atk-abh02a10:26_2: Sammāsambuddhena hi suttantabhājanīyasmiṁyeva lokiyalokuttarāni maggaṅgāni kathitāni;
atk-abh02a10:26_3: abhidhammabhājanīye pana pañhāpucchake ca lokuttarānevāti evamayaṁ maggavibhaṅgopi teparivaṭṭaṁ nīharitvāva bhājetvā dassitoti.
